testcase.name: ActiTime Login Test Case
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enters username and password......................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then My Account label is displayed..........................................passed When Enter search text as "samsung m32".....................................passed And Clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then Search should display the result for "SAMSUNG M32 5G (Sky blue, 128 GB)".passed
